input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Christmas Tree Skirt"
Reference Product Description:
Usher in the warmth and charm of the holiday season with National Tree Company's Christmas Tree Collar. This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement. The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece. Constructed with strong polyester materials, this seasonal decoration is sturdy and durable, allowing it to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Place this adorable skirt around the base of your tree to add a festive feel to any family room or living space. At National Tree Company, we strive to create high quality Christmas decorations to help you transform your home so you can keep making every holiday moment magical.

This 54 inch, red ruffle tree skirt surrounds the base of your trimmed tree to add a finishing touch to your Christmas decoration arrangement.
The two-part design provides a clean, attractive finishing touch that will add a distinctive flair to your Christmas holiday centerpiece.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Set aside 45-60 minutes to properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories do not have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Arcadia Home Handmade Contemporary Pebble Pattern Tree Skirt'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Glausen Solid Color Tree Skirt'
  - Name='Fennco Styles Rustic Burlap Tree Skirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Arcadia Home Handmade Contemporary Pebble Pattern Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a Christmas tree skirt like the reference, serving the same purpose and function. The handmade and contemporary pebble pattern aspects differentiate it in style, but the core product type and use is very similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Glausen Solid Color Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a Christmas tree skirt, this product closely matches the reference in type and function. The solid color suggests a simpler design compared to the ruffle in the reference, but both are traditional tree skirts designed to surround the base of the tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fennco Styles Rustic Burlap Tree Skirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Christmas tree skirt like the reference, meant for the same functional use. The rustic burlap material differentiates the construction and look, but it remains a tree skirt and will appeal to overlapping customer needs.
